mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, U.NAME, U.BIRTH, U.EMAIL, U.PHONE, U.JOB, R.ROLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.ID=U.ID INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ID=R.ID WHERE M.ID=#{id}
SELECT PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT M.ID, U.NAME, U.BIRTH, U.GENDER, U.PHONE, U.EMAIL, U.ADDRESS, R.ROLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.ID=U.ID INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ID=R.ID WHERE M.ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PWD=#{pwd} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET NAME=#{name}, JOB=#{job}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, HANDICAP=#{handicap} WHERE ID=#{id}
